column2: This mount skin can be acquired through the Curious Creatures Mount Adoption License from the Black Lion Trading Company.

This will replace the appearance of one back item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>The Ascalon Vanguard fought and died with honor defending their people.</c>

This back item skin has no stats of its own.
Living World Season 5 Episode 2: Shadow in the Ice available for free!
